00007 #ifndef __litesql_operations_hpp

00009 #include "litesql/datasource.hpp"
00012 namespace litesql {
00013 using namespace std;
00015 template <class T>
00016 litesql::DataSource<T> select(const litesql::Database & db, 
00017                               const litesql::Expr &e=litesql::Expr()) {
00018     return litesql::DataSource<T>(db, e);
00019 }
00022 template <class T>
00023 litesql::DataSource<T> intersect(const litesql::DataSource<T>& ds1, 
00024                                  const litesql::DataSource<T>& ds2) {
00025     std::string sel = ds1.idQuery().asString() + " INTERSECT " 
00026         + ds2.idQuery().asString();
00027     return litesql::DataSource<T>(ds1.getDatabase(), T::Id.in(sel));
00028 }
00030 template <class T>
00031 litesql::DataSource<T> union_(const litesql::DataSource<T>& ds1, 
00032                               const litesql::DataSource<T>& ds2) {
00033     std::string sel = ds1.idQuery().asString() + " UNION " 
00034         + ds2.idQuery().asString();
00035     return litesql::DataSource<T>(ds1.getDatabase(), T::Id.in(sel));
00036 }
00039 template <class T>
00040 litesql::DataSource<T> except(const litesql::DataSource<T>& ds1, 
00041                               const litesql::DataSource<T>& ds2) {
00042     std::string sel = ds1.idQuery().asString() + " EXCEPT " 
00043         + ds2.idQuery().asString();
00044     return litesql::DataSource<T>(ds1.getDatabase(), T::Id.in(sel));
00045 }
